name: The Cat Game (IER Studios)
description:
"The Cat Game" is a small, short and weird game where you feed a cat.

Feeding a hungry cat. Do it. He will be really thankful for it. You can't do anything else either.

No one knows.  No one knows what that room is. No one knows when it was created. No one knows who the human is, not even himself. No one knows who the cat is, not even the cat himself.  No one knows how they arrived there. The only thing they know is the cat is hungry and the human has food for him.

The cat. Who doesn't like cats?

Keyboard: Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move and to interact with the cat

Mobile: Slide your finger across your screen to move the player
